T02D3785:224b-3: bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa /
T02D3785:224b-4: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3785:224b-5: dam pa tog dkar dga' ldan pho brang dam pa ru //
T02D3785:224b-6: mi pham mgon la rgyal tshab dam par dbang bskur zhing //
T02D3785:224b-7: 'dzam gling nyid du glang chen thal ka ltar gshegs gang //
T02D3785:224b-8: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs
T02D3785:224b-9: shog / ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer dam par
T02D3785:224b-10: zas gtsang sras // bud med skyon bral g-yo sgyu spangs pa lha mdzes yum //
T02D3785:224b-11: lhums su zla bcur blo gros ldan pa sh'akya'i rigs //
T02D3785:224b-12: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs
T02D3785:224b-13: shog / lum bi'i tshal ni dben zhing nyams dga'
T02D3785:224b-14: pla ksha yi // yal ga nas bzung bltams gyur tshang dang brgya byin 'dud //
T02D3785:224b-15: mkha' la gshegs te phyogs bcur padma byung gyur gang //
T02D3785:224b-16: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'di bde legs
T02D3785:224b-17: shog / gzhal med khar mdzes dam par drang srong
T02D3785:224b-18: 'dun mdzad nas // mtshan ltas shis par brjod de ston par 'byung 'gyur dang //
T02D3785:224b-19: sh'aka rigs bud med 'khor ldan kun bsus rgyan btags gang //
T02D3785:225a-0: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / gzhon nu'i stobs ni @225a * //
T02D3785:225a-1: sgyu rtsal yig rtsis 'phong la sogs //
T02D3785:225a-2: kun las mthar byung lha mi la sogs kun gyis mchod //
T02D3785:225a-3: sh'akya'i rigs 'khrungs log rtog bsal phyir btsun mo'i 'khor //
T02D3785:225a-4: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs
T02D3785:225a-5: shog / pho brang nas byung rga na shi ba
T02D3785:225a-6: la sogs gzigs // mi rnams rmongs mdzad lha yis mdun bdar mkha' la ni //
T02D3785:225a-7: srid gsum dag las rgal phyir mthon mthing dbu skra bregs //
T02D3785:225a-8: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs
T02D3785:225a-9: shog / lha rnams rdzu 'phrul gyis ni ngur smrig
T02D3785:225a-10: gos rnams phul // nee ranydza na'i chu bor dka' thub ma lus rdzogs //
T02D3785:225a-11: thub pa bsam gtan la bzheng bkra shis 'o thug bzhes //
T02D3785:225a-12: bkra shis dam pa des kyang der 'dir bde legs
T02D3785:225a-13: shog / padma las byung khyu mchog byang chub shing
T02D3785:225a-14: drung du // skyil mo krung bcas mi g-yo mchog gis bdud btul nas //
T02D3785:225a-15: tho rangs bdud btul mi 'gyur phun sum sangs rgyas pa //
T02D3785:225a-16: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs
T02D3785:225a-17: shog / w'a r'a na sir chos kyi 'khor lo
T02D3785:225a-18: mgon pos bskor // kun shes la sogs lnga sde bzang la bden bzhi bstan //
T02D3785:225a-19: lha klu lha min mi min 'dun gyur gang //
T02D3785:225a-20: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs
T02D3785:225a-21: shog / nga rgyal snyems par ldan pa'i ston pa
T02D3785:225a-22: drug btul cing // glang chen rab smyo mi bzad lha sbyin gyis rbad btul //
T02D3785:225a-23: drang srong mchog la spre'u rgyal cang shes sbrang rtsi phul //
T02D3785:225a-24: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs
T02D3785:225a-25: shog / padmo gzhon nu lta bu'i mtshan ltas sh'akya'i
T02D3785:225a-26: rigs // zas gtsang sras su rgyal rigs 'khor los sgyur rgyal du //
T02D3785:225a-27: bltams pa nas bzung lha yi ma lus rdzogs par
T02D3785:225a-28: ris dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog
T02D3785:225a-29: / byams pa'i stobs ni 'gro ba ma lus sgrol
T02D3785:225a-30: mdzad cing // sems can mtha' yas zhi bde'i lam la bkod gyur te //
T02D3785:225a-31: grong khyer rtsva mchog dam par dgongs pa yongs rdzogs gang //
T02D3785:225a-32: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs
